DESCRIPTION: Hornets are 1-cost attacks that deal 11 damage.
Bumblebees are 1-cost skills that gain 10 block.
Worker Bees are 0-cost skills that gain 1 queenmod:Industry.
Drones are 0-cost skills that draw a card and exhaust.
Nectar is used with certain cards to improve their effects.
Swarm grants you block and damages enemies. It follows the targets of your cards.
Hive cards are Hornets, Bumblebees, Honeybees and Drones.
When a Pollinated enemy is attacked, gain 2 Nectar.
Transform a Drone in your hand or draw pile into the chosen hive card. Hand is checked before draw pile.
While this is in your hand, it will list a series of card types. Play them in sequence to reap the rewards!
Take 50% less damage. On receiving attack damage, lose 1 Flight.
A Riposte is a 1-cost Attack that deals 9 damage.
A Riposte+ is a 1-cost Attack that deals 11 damage.

A Commander is an upgraded version of a Hive card that costs 1 more and has bonus effects. NL Drone Commander: Upgrade all Drones in your draw pile. Draw a card. NL Hornet Commander: Deal 11 damage. When you play a Hive card this turn, deal 4 damage to a random enemy NL Bumblebee Commander: Gain 10 Block. When you play a Hive card this turn, gain 2 Block next turn. NL Honeybee Commander: Gain 5 Nectar. Apply 1 Pollinate.
Playing a finisher ends your turn immediately.
A Drone+ is a 0-cost skill that draw 2 cards and Exhausts.
Look at the top X cards of your deck, and choose any number to send to your discard pile.
Weak, Vulnerable and Frail are Common Debuffs.
At the start of your turn, gain 1 queenmod:Nectar for each Industry, also draw one additional card at the start of your turn for every 5 Industry you have.
